role.descr: agent, entity causing something to become complicated

example.text: Ms . Miller was hospitalized on October 29 , 2009 , with complications of diverticulitis requiring IV antibiotics.
example.amr: (h / hospitalize-01 :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Ms." :op2 "Miller")) :time (d / date-entity :month 10 :day 29 :year 2009) :ARG1-of (c / cause-01 :ARG0 (t / thing :pl + :ARG3-of (c2 / complicate-01 :ARG0 ((d / disease-disorder :name (n / name :op1 "diverticulitis") :ARG2-of (h / have-disorder-91 :ARG1 p))
